title: Kundan Diamond Zig-Zag Vanki Bangle - Contemporary Design
features: A sleek and modern take on the traditional Vanki. Features a distinct zig-zag pattern meticulously crafted in 22K gold. The geometric design is accentuated with strategically placed Kundan diamonds within each segment, adding a touch of brilliance. The open cuff design allows for comfortable and easy wear.
occasions: and adding a touch of modern elegance to traditional attire. Can be worn for pre-wedding functions (like Sangeet)
or as a statement piece for special occasions.
description: A unique blend of traditional craftsmanship and modern design. The Kundan diamonds offer a classic sparkle, while the zig-zag pattern adds a contemporary flair. Crafted with high-quality 22K gold and finished with the renowned Hyderabadi polish for lasting shine and durability. This Vanki bangle is a true statement piece that will elevate any outfit. It's durable and has cultural significance for its origin from Hyderabadi artisans.
